column5: Any one know if I should be taking a boat or boots to minden this coming Fri / Sat.  Are the lakes open today? or freezing up?  Thanks Entropy
~~~Was up there yesterday, all the major lakes were wide open. Kas, Gull, Minner Bay, 12 Mile, Grass,and Lake Haliburton. Only problem you might have is finding a ramp  with enough water to launch
Thanks, I will likely take the 14 ft alum in the back of the truck or canoe, so a launch will not be a problem.  Updates are appricated.
